attributes.action: Deplore the recent lenient sentence given to a child rapist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Judge Julian Hall sentenced a man who raped a ten-year old girl to two years because he felt the girl 'dressed provocatively and looked 16'. This judgement suggests that a 10 year old girl is partially responsible for her rape. We are asking the Prime Minister to deplore the leniency of the sentence.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
